summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5360 for the improvement of Ryan Street, from 59th Avenue South to 56th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 63199, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
